channel.title: More Coding
channel.description:
I've been wanting to add something big to my server, and I've basically concluded to a mini-game.
What mini-game should I make!? Give me a detailed description! I'll put you in credits for what ever tutorial I make for it by the way ;)

item.title: More Coding
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

Lol O M G first time you run out of ideas

Read full topic

item.title: More Coding
item.dc:creator: @Muffinator Muffinator
item.description:
@Muffinator wrote:

Maybe sumthing like a holiday event?

First person to catch 10 imps and brings them back to Wise Old Man gets a holiday item?

Rubber Chicken?
10 million gp?
Dies after handing over the 10 imps?

If you click on an imp you pick up a red marionette? Replacing the imp since you cant actually carry an imp… I think…

Read full topic

item.title: More Coding
item.dc:creator: @Controlkill Controlkill
item.description:
@Controlkill wrote:

Maybe sumtin a little like the jad mini-game?
But instead of goin into the cave and killin jad.
You go into a nightclub and beat the living shit thru Paris Hilton?
The winner gets the chance to catch a bullet with their teeth.
Im sorry, im just really bored :o

Read full topic
